name: nus-crypto-exchange
description: A simulated crypto exchange for educational use

scripts.clean: screen python3 && screen -ls | grep Detached | cut -d. -f1 | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kill && sudo rm -rf nce-backend && sudo rm -rf nce-matchingengine && sudo rm -rf nce-frontend
scripts.matchingengine: git clone https://github.com/KeithZHIJIAN/nce-matchingengine.git && cp .env nce-matchingengine/ && cd nce-matchingengine && python3 init.database.py && screen python3 main.py && python3 init.orderbook.py && cd ..
scripts.backend: git clone https://github.com/sheshenk/nce-backend.git && cd nce-backend && npm install && screen npm start && cd ..
scripts.frontend: git clone https://github.com/sheshenk/nce-frontend.git && cd nce-frontend && npm install && screen npm start && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run matchingengine && npm run backend && npm run frontend
scripts.production: npm run clean && npm run matchingengine && npm run backend

author: Pitchappan & Zhi Jian
